index.title: Sign in
index.subtitle: Enter your email and password to sign in
index.twoFactorDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
index.lostAccess: Lost access to your authenticator app?
index.backupCodeDescription: Enter one of your backup codes to access your account
index.backupCodeDescription2: Enter one of the backup codes you received when setting up 2FA
index.errorOccurred: An error occurred while logging in
index.errorOccurred2FA: An error occurred while verifying 2FA code
index.errorOccurredBackup: An error occurred while verifying backup code
index.errorOccurredGithub: An error occurred while signing in with GitHub
index.errorOccurredGoogle: An error occurred while signing in with Google
index.pleaseEnterValidBackup: Please enter a valid backup code
